website_summaries.verdict: Aside from being in fashion, the minimalist sneaker trend poses different advantages that most consumers prefer. One of which is the fact that it can be paired with different outfits. The Native Venice exudes this and more. Using a different upper material from the signature EVA that the brand has been known for, this shoe portrays that the brand can diversify but still keep its heritage of producing a lightweight shoe that is ideal to use for travels.
pros: A couple of purchasers appreciate how easy it is to keep these sneakers clean
One has compared these with Toms, only much better
Some satisfied consumers find the minimalist style appealing since they can be paired with different outfits
Numerous reviewers have described these as a lightweight, cool, and easy to wear
It is among the Native sneakers that are perfect for the summer and outdoors, according to some testers
Some commenters find the price of these sneakers to be affordable
These have very soft footbeds, according to a significant number of shoppers
cons: Several of those who have bought complain that the shoe rubs at the back of the foot which causes blisters
They blame it on the high insole which makes the heel exposed
A couple of users wish that there are half sizes available

customer_reviews.title: I thought they would be comfortable, but...
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for looks. I bought these shoes because they would go with everything, but unfortunately the fit just did not work for me. The insole was very stiff and wide. The shoe was difficult to put on, and I felt like the top of my foot was being pressed down by the shoe. The insole seemed to make the shoe too high as too much of my heel was exposed, making walking very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves his red shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome, stylish... My husband lives them! And the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Finnemore

customer_reviews.title: After you break them in, they are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: These are my favorite shoes. It did take a few wears to break in, but now they are my go-to for casual days. I now have 3 pair. I like the way these look on my feet. But the pros stop there. They are not the most comfortable and caused bad blisters on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: spruceabierose

customer_reviews.title: I bought the white pair and have not been disappointed. The dirt can be wiped off so easily- ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for me and I have been wearing them straight for the last 4 days. I bought the white pair and have not been disappointed. The dirt can be wiped off so easily- as well as the rain. If you are looking for casual white comfortable summer shoes- these are light weight, cool, easy to wear without showing the dirt. I wear a size 6 in women's shoes and bought the 4 men's size. Fit perfectly. They stretch too so they are becoming even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AIL

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: Rubs too much on the top in the back. I can't wear these at all because of that problem. Though they look nice and are light weight I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crandell

customer_reviews.title: Thee Minimalist shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite shoes. They look minimalist and last a long time definitely for the price. I buy a pair or two yearly. Hoping that this company stays in business for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. El

customer_reviews.title: Fit TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I have other native shoes and havent had an ossue. These however fit extra small. I cannot get my foot in easily and when i do it seems as if they toe will rip right through. I am returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But it got to fit pretty well for some time's wearing
customer_reviews.text: It is a little small for the first a few time wear. But it got to fit pretty well for some time's wearing. Plus it is very light and soft. Very good choice for daily walking.
customer_reviews.author: TMNT

customer_reviews.title: A bit smaller than than usual...
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than the size I usually order, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Fishshiyu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes, great for walking
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, breathable, shoes. So far, great for walking, though I haven't walked long distances in them. They don't provide a ton of arch support, but that's not what they're designed for. Would definitely get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: maitai

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had them for very long so I'm can't speak about longevity but they were super comfy although by the end of the day on
customer_reviews.text: I Iove them so far. I haven't had them for very long so I'm can't speak about longevity but they were super comfy although by the end of the day on the first wear, they did chaff in the heel area. Over very adorable and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryll Karroll

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering shoes online. Rounded up to the next whole size. They were a little wide, but not too much. Like these so much that I ordered another pair today!
customer_reviews.author: Short100

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes but I would recommend buying new insoles. Your ankles will thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robert II

customer_reviews.title: Unisex fashion sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Ordered them for myself because the colors are just what I wanted. Fit and colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: awilli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and feels good to use
customer_reviews.text: Hgh is shoes are easy to slip on and are very cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: michael player

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy travel. Good look. Can take water and keep going. Fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert OReilly

customer_reviews.title: wayyyy better than those canvas Toms who keep odors
customer_reviews.text: already had a pair of apolo chukkas, and native are always on point with the feel of the shoe, materials and being light! wayyyy better than those canvas Toms who keep odors.
customer_reviews.author: jer9piche

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Purchases men's size 7, not womans size 7. Product is fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Feet Were Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Wore them to Disneyland and my feet were happy! I'm a fan of Native shoes!
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second summer having a pair of these shoes and I love them! They are super comfy and light and I got constant compliments on them last summer. The best part is that with all of the sweaty stinky shoes for the summer, these never smelled nor did my feet after wearing them. I wear a size 8 typically but wear a 9 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Lmb

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes! You wanna look smooth with something light ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoes! You wanna look smooth with something light under your toes? These jokers will have the ladies asking if you 50 on your neck!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing assignments for this product are innacurate
customer_reviews.text: My Usual size 7 was too small. Exchanged for size 8 which was also too small!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond W. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are light, great to wear as everyday shoes, easy to clean. I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz Alrandi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The white one is not match as a pair. One foot is 6M and another is 8M. = =
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We really wish these were available in a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased in glass green for my trans daughter who wears size EU 48 and mens shoes 13 or 14. She loved the color and style, but was heartbroken that they were too small for her tootsies. She could technically get her feet in the shoes, but they were too short and too narrow. We really wish these were available in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Takes' confessions of regret

product_meta.title: Native Men's Venice Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: Inspired by classic, casual silhouettes, the native aesthetic captures a look that is timeless yet totally new using futuristic materials, injected-molded eva that will mold to your feet.
feature_bullets: International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
